attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO STOP AND THINK HOW RIDICULOUSE AND UN FAIR THIS TAX INCREASE IS TO OWNERS OF 4X4 VEHICLES, IT IS ONE OF OUR MAIN WORK TOOLS, IF AN INDIVIDUALL HAS TO HAVE ONE OF THESE VEHICLES FOR THEIR WORK & CAN PROVE IT THEN DONT PENALISE THEM.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
